QuestData.Title: The Pit of Saron
QuestData.Description: Quickly, through the portal! I'll find you on the other side.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lady Sylvanas Windrunner inside the entrance to the Pit of Saron.
QuestData.RewardText: Incapable fools.$B$BI begin to wonder if any of these louts from the tournament will be of any use at all. Perhaps you'll prove me wrong.
